scripts.apps:nextjs-ts:build: cd apps/nextjs-ts && npm i && npm run build
scripts.apps:nextjs-ts:test: cd apps/nextjs-ts && npm i && npm run test
scripts.apps:nextjs-ts:start: cd apps/nextjs-ts && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.apps:simple-react:build: cd apps/simple-react && npm install && npm run build
scripts.apps:simple-react:start: cd apps/simple-react && npm install && npm run start
scripts.apps:simple-react:test: cd apps/simple-react && npm install && npm run test
